title: Butsuri-san de Musou shitetara Motemote ni Narimashita
original_name: 物理さんで無双してたらモテモテになりました
sinopse: His harem consists of demi-human girls?! I, who was forced to withdraw from my world, to learn magic with an alchemist. While learning, I come upon a moment that only with my eyes could make any girl fall in love.
